questions.question: Set in the sky atop giant clouds, this arc features a battle against the 'God' of Skypiea, Enel, and the discovery of an ancient bell. What is...?
This arc is the first in the series and introduces Monkey D. Luffy and his aspiration to become the Pirate King. What is...?
This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' journey to an underwater island and their encounter with a fish-man supremacist group. What is...?
This technique, utilized by a member of the Straw Hat Pirates, involves creating an illusion of multiple copies. What is...?
This technique, used by a Straw Hat crew member, involves transforming into a heavier, more powerful form. What is...?
This power, wielded by one of the Supernovas, allows the user to create and manipulate rooms where they can spatially manipulate anything inside. What is...?
This character, often seen with a pinwheel hat, is the adoptive older brother of a Straw Hat crew member and was once a member of the Sun Pirates. Who is...?
This character, also known as 'Black Leg', is the Straw Hat Pirates' chef and a master of Black Leg Style martial arts. Who is...?
This former member of the Royal Shichibukai is known for their Snake-Snake Fruit powers and role as the queen of Amazon Lily. Who is...?
